caption:
AI is powerful, but it doesn’t always get it right. 🤖 

AI hallucinations occur when models perceive patterns that don’t exist, they can generate misleading outputs which in turn, gives out information that sounds plausible but isn’t real. 

As AI becomes more integrated into our lives, understanding its limitations is crucial. Have you come across any instance involving AI Hallucination? 
 
Tell us in the comments below. 

#AIHallucination #AI #ArtificalIntelligence
